name: RicoGraph
description:
Idea

This is a really small paint program inspired by riso printing and the Magna Doodle toys.
As an artist I get frustrated trying to paint and draw digitally because I overuse the Ctrl. Z command, so this program doesn't have it.

Controls
  • 1️⃣2️⃣3️⃣ to change active color screens (4️⃣to paint on all at once).
  • [Space] to clear the canvas.
  • Click on the bottom colors to change the active screen color.
  • Click to paint.
  • If you rescale the window just press [Space] to fix it (it will clear your drawing!)

I've made this in under 4 hours, so don't expect much.
